values: This journal, formerly for use at the now closed and once a part of , is now being used for play at . Concrit on the character of Rhinox may be left here in comments. (Although do keep in mind that this version has been through the "Reality Warped" stage of and is being given a second chance following his role in Beast Machines. He may be a little darker and a little more devious than strictly canon Beast Wars Rhinox at times. The whole point of giving him a second chance at life is to work those issues out.)
